caption_placeholder: Write a short caption here to help explain why the image is relevant to the article...(in Spanish)
caption_description: Write a short caption to be shown below the image, explaining how it’s relevant to the article. (in Spanish)
caption_recommendation: Recommended: Open the image file page to read details that can help with caption writing. (in Spanish)
caption: Caption (in Spanish)
image_inspector_question: Add this image to the start of the article? (in Spanish)
image_details_caption_help: The following details may help with writing a suitable caption. (in Spanish)
prototype_note: Note: This is not the real filepage on Wikimedia Commons, but a close approximation for the purposes of this user testing prototype. (in Spanish)
postsubmit_close: Close to view changes (or edit again) (in Spanish)
preview_disclaimer: Al guardar los cambios, tú aceptas los términos de uso y acepta publicar su contribución bajo las licencias CC BY-SA 3.0 y GFDL.
homepage_se_get_started: Get started with some Suggested edits (in Spanish)
homepage_se_description: Ayuda a aumentar el conocimiento del mundo con algunas correcciones fáciles en los artículos de Wikipedia.
homepage_impact_description: Ayuda a extender el conocimiento libre al mundo editando los temas que más te interesen.
homepage_impact_footer: Una vez que comiences a editar, aquí verás cuántas personas están viendo los artículos que has editado.
homepage_mentor_description: You’ve been assigned an experienced editor to answer your questions about editing. (in Spanish)
homepage_help_description: Haz una pregunta en el Café de Ayuda o lee páginas de ayuda
reject_question: Why is this not a good image? (in Spanish)
reject_description: Choose one or more reasons. Your answers improve future suggestions. (in Spanish)
reject_reason_info: Not enough information to decide (in Spanish)
reject_reason_subject: I don’t know this subject (in Spanish)
reject_reason_language: I can’t read the language in the image and/or in the description (in Spanish)
suggested_edits_add_image_description: Evaluate whether a machine-suggested image should be used on this article. (in Spanish)
suggested_edits_add_image_enrich_underst: Images can help enrich and extend someone’s understanding of a subject. (in Spanish)
suggested_edits_add_image_decide: Decide whether an image suggested by a machine should be added to this article. (in Spanish)
suggested_edits_choose_topics: Choose some topics you are interested in editing (in Spanish)
suggested_edits_easy_description: Recomendado para cuando estás aprendiendo a editar por primera vez.
suggested_edits_medium_description: Después de que hayas completado algunas ediciones fáciles.
suggested_edits_hard_description: Cuando hayas aprendido sobre las mejores prácticas de Wikipedia.
suggested_edits_find_references: Encontrar referencias (añade fuentes para artículos existentes)
suggested_edits_create_article_help: It’s recommended that you try a few hard tasks first before attempting a new article. <u>Learn more</u> about writing a new missing article here (in Spanish).
postedit_toast_accept: Has publicado una edición. ¡Gracias y a por las siguientes!
postedit_toast_reject: Gracias por revisar las sugerencias. ¡Sigue adelante!
guidance_image_header: Look at the image suggested (in Spanish)
guidance_image_body: The image is suggested by a machine and found from Wikimedia Commons, the free license image repository used by Wikipedia for images. (in Spanish)
guidance_article_header: Is it suitable for this article? (in Spanish)
guidance_article_body: Review the article for which this image is being suggested. Does it seem like the image is suitable and helpful for readers to understand this topic? (in Spanish)
guidance_details_header: Use the image details to help with your decision (in Spanish)
guidance_details_body: To help evaluate the image suitability, review the image by looking at its file name, description, the reason it was suggested, and zooming in to see more details. (in Spanish)
guidance_caption_header: Write a caption that gives context to the image (in Spanish)
guidance_caption_body: Describe the image so it’s clear how it relates to the article. A few guidelines: (in Spanish)
guidance_caption_guide_value: Avoid making value judgements like “good”, “ugly”, or “beautiful”. (in Spanish)
guidance_caption_guide_review: Review the description and filename for information that is relevant to include. (in Spanish)
guidance_caption_guide_language: Write in the language of the Wikipedia you are in. (in Spanish)
